about.title: About
about.introduce: 我是一名前端工程師，對於前端技術有著濃厚的興趣，喜歡學習新技術，並且樂於分享。

content.introduce:
**Payment Software Maintenance (Vue2)**: Responsible for maintaining the already-launched payment software, ensuring the system runs stably, and performing necessary feature optimizations and performance improvements.
**Real-time Chat Software Development (Vue3)**: Developing a real-time chat application based on Vue3, integrating WebSocket technology to implement real-time communication features, ensuring efficient user interaction.
**Dynamic 3D Page Design**: Using Three.js to design dynamic and interactive 3D pages to enhance user experience.
**Multilingual Support (i18n)**:  Implementing multilingual translation of the application using i18n technology to meet the needs of global users.

I have deeply studied multiple modern front-end technologies through self-learning, including TypeScript, Vue 3, Nuxt 3, and other frameworks. I also combined tools like Sass and Tailwind CSS to create responsive and highly maintainable websites. During the learning process, I practiced backend technologies through Firebase, which enhanced my full-stack development capabilities.

content.company: Front-End Web Design and Programming Technical Practice Course
content.introduce: Through the training in the in-service program, I gained a deep understanding of the basics of front-end development, from HTML, CSS to JavaScript and jQuery. I also learned how to use Bootstrap for rapid prototyping.

content.name: Personal Blog
content.introduce: A place to learn more about me

content.name: Birthday Candle Blowing
content.introduce: Created a 3D model using Three.js and simulated blowing out candles by detecting sound levels.

content.name: Weather Assistant
content.introduce: A weather query website built with Nuxt3, integrated with the Central Weather Bureau API.

content.name: E-commerce Clothing Website
content.introduce: An e-commerce website written with Vue3 and TypeScript, integrating Firebase for the membership system.

content.name: Hotel Booking Website
content.introduce: A hotel booking website built with Vue3, integrated with Firebase for the membership system.
